title: Connect to Nature: Native American Medicine and Meditation/ Conéctese a la Naturaleza: Medicina Indígena y Meditación
description: Connect with nature through stories, herbs, music and stones. Native American storyteller and singer-songwriter Red Feather Woman, a member of the Ft. Peck Tribes, will lead a medicine and meditation workshop using Native American teachings and philosophy. Participants will enjoy nature stories that correlate with teachings and visualizations. All supplies will be provided. Space is limited; registration is required. Please visit our online calendar to register. Conéctese con la naturaleza vía historias, hierbas, música y piedras.
cleaned_text: Connect to Nature: Native American Medicine and Meditation/ Conéctese a la Naturaleza: Medicina Indígena y Meditación Connect with nature through stories, herbs, music and stones. Native American storyteller and singer-songwriter Red Feather Woman, a member of the Ft. Peck Tribes, will lead a medicine and meditation workshop using Native American teachings and philosophy. Participants teachings All will visit our online calendar to register. Conéctese con la naturaleza vía historias, hierbas, música y piedras. Red Feather Woman, narradora, cantante, compositora y miembra de la tribu Ft. Peck, conducirá un taller de medicina y meditación usando enseñanzas y filosofía indígena. Participantes disfrutaran de historias de naturaleza que se correlacionan con enseñanzas y visualizaciones. Todos los materiales serán proporcionados. El espacio es limitado; se requiere registro.
